subject: Baseball
Cheating
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Yvars was a catcher for the New York Giants who took part in, and later revealed, a sign-stealing scheme that might have helped propel the Giants to their 1951 pennant victory.
snippet: Yvars was a catcher for the New York Giants who took part in, and later revealed, a sign-stealing scheme that might have helped propel the Giants to their 1951 pennant victory.
